lesson.title: Vesting and Lock Mechanisms
lesson.objective: Understand why long-term locks create value

sections.content: 60 days. Two months. In a world of instant gratification, this is genuine commitment. Vesting mechanisms exist because long-term alignment creates better outcomes for everyone.

Lock periods filter out speculators. When you commit to staying, you're signaling that you believe in the protocol's future. This signal is valuable - it builds trust with the community and often unlocks additional benefits.

content: Vesting = tokens unlock over time, not all at once
Lock mechanisms align incentives for long-term success
Early exit typically forfeits unvested rewards

questions.question: What is the purpose of vesting schedules?
options: To align incentives for long-term commitment
